title: Kourtney Kardashian shares throwback photo of when she dressed up as Ariana Grande for Halloween
text:
She dressed up as Ariana Grande for Halloween last year.

And ahead of debuting her new holiday look, Kourtney Kardashian shared some behind-the-scenes photos from 2018.

The 40-year-old opted for the singer's short pink mini dress as she posed by the piano as a prop to emphasize her new musical gift.

Scroll down for video

Throwback: Kourtney Kardashian shared some throwback photos from last year's Halloween when she dressed up as Ariana Grande, on Wednesday

'No tears left to cry,' she captioned, referencing Ariana's top tune.

Kourtney slicked her tresses back and added thick long blonde hair extensions to completely execute the look.

The mom-of-three added over-the-knee boots of a taupe color and held onto a microphone as a prop.

Ariana, is that you? The 40-year-old opted for the singer's short pink mini dress as she posed by the piano as a prop to emphasize her new musical gift

Who wore it better? Kourtney slicked her tresses back and added thick long blonde hair extensions to completely execute the look

Another photo had Kourtney pose by a corner in her home that was decorated with bone colored pumpkins and a silver skeleton on top.

Earlier in the day, she also shared a sweet photo of her daughter Penelope and her dog, Honey.

The 40-year-old was not in the photo and captioned it, 'baby'.

Penelope rocked a silver half-sleeved shirt and a bracelet on her wrist.

Honey was in a Burberry inspired harness and had its mouth open - something which many dog lover fans said was due to the anxiety he was feeling.

Adorable: Earlier in the day, she also shared a sweet photo of her daughter Penelope and her dog, Honey, before users told her the dog was anxious

After a user asked if Honey was smiling or growling, Kourtney responded: 'yawning she's sleepy.'

Some were quick to add to the conversation that the Honey's yawn means she's stressed and anxious rather than tired.

According to Pedigree, yawning in dogs is a signal that they're in need of a calming situation.

'It's a way of saying, I've had enough and my patience is running out,' they revealed.

Penelope got the dog in September 2019, and it's the sister of Kim's puppy, Sushi.

Matching: Penelope got the dog in September 2019, and it's the sister of Kim's puppy, Sushi

Best friends: Penelope is often seen with her mom Kourtney, with the pair sharing an unbreakable bond

'A yawn may indicate anticipation or stress, too. Your dog may yawn repeatedly when he's waiting in the vet's office as a way of dealing with nervousness.'

Penelope is often seen with her mom Kourtney, with the pair sharing an unbreakable bond.

Kourtney called their love 'unconditional' during a tribute post on her birthday back in July.

'I'm so in love with her,' she said.

'I can't believe she's seven. She inspires me to be my absolute best. The things I have learned from her are immeasurable. Unconditional, pure love.'

However things don't appear to always be rainbows and sunshine with her middle child that she shares with ex-boyfriend, Scott Disick.

Not all sunshine: On a recent episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Kourtney revealed that Penelope had scratched a nanny, forcing her to quit

On a recent episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Kourtney revealed that Penelope had scratched a nanny, forcing her to quit.

The mother-of-three described her middle daughter as 'out of control' and said she even seems to 'black out' during fits of rage.

'I don't even have a nanny anymore,' Kourtney revealed during a family dinner.

'She was putting her in the car and Penelope scratched her face, but P can be out of control,' Kourtney said. 'I think she blacks out and does these wild things.'

Getting Pooshy: The siren was seen in a black tank top to plug an article on skin on Tuesday

And while Kourtney appeared calm regarding the situation, grandma Kris Jenner was definitely more concerned.

'This is so much more serious than I think you realize,' the 63-year-old matriarch said. 'I had six kids ... not one time in my entire life did anyone ever have a complaint like this.'

'I scratched you and I used to f***ing slap my nannies like, bam, across the face,' Kourtney added in.

'We need to take care of this before it gets too far out of control,' Kris told the family.

Kourtney shares Mason, nine, Penelope, seven, and Reign, four, with her ex-boyfriend, Scott Disick.
description: Kourtney Kardashian shared some throwback photos from last year's Halloween when she dressed up as Ariana Grande, on Wednesday.
